Hound of Ulster

Hound of Ulster is an action-packed game with fantastical elements and thrilling combat, offering a free reinterpretation of the myth from the Ulster Cycle. Explore a world that unfolds tile by tile as you fight to reach your goal: the Bull of Cooley.

Meet the Characters

Cu Chulainn

A legendary warrior of Ulster, brave and fierce in battle, wielding the powerful Gáe Bolg.

Morrigan

The mysterious goddess of war and fate, watching and meddling from the shadows.

Gifts of Morrigan

The mythical bulls at the heart of the conflict, symbols of power and prize of war.

Ferdiad

Cu Chulainn’s childhood friend, turned tragic rival on the battlefield.

Meet your Enemies

Soldier

The valiant foot soldiers of the Queen Mehb army.

Archer

The greatly skilled archers of Queen Mehb.

Banshee

The hostile, weeping spirits of the forest.

Pooka

Mischievous little creatures, bringers of bad luck. At least, of yours.
